Focus stacking rig Brief: Reuse 3D printer components to learn how to make a basic mechatronic system
MVP: A one axis slide for photography
Requires:
Control board
alu frame
Progress 2023-10-02 Disassembled TronXY S5 3d printer and scavenged parts + Ordered some motor controllers + Plan for software/control + Use ESP32C3 to control both motor and camera via wifi. + Use Sony QX1 that I have to keep it light and trigger commands via wifi api from the rig controller. +
